en.name: Archaic Petra
en.4p: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

zh.name: 悠古的磐岩
zh.4p: 获得结晶反应形成的晶片时，队伍中所有角色获得35%对应元素伤害加成，持续10秒。同时只能通过该效果获得一种元素伤害加成。
